org.talares.cache

Interface Cache

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AutoUpdateCache, SimpleCache
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoCache

    public interface Cache
    Interface whose instances allow the library to make use of a given cache implementation. This leaves the user free to supply a cache solution of his own choosing.

    An instance of one of the implementing types should be provided at library instantiation. When no cache instance is provided the NoCache strategy is assumed. When an instance of Cache is provided, the SimpleCache strategy is assumed.

    Since:
    0.1.0
    See Also:
    NoCache, SimpleCache, AutoUpdateCache

      void put(java.lang.Object key, java.lang.Object value)
